title: Ecuador's Latest Free Trade Agreements Aim for Economic Growth - Bloomberg Tax
summary: Ecuador has signed new trade agreements with South Korea, China, and Costa Rica, aiming to boost economic growth and attract foreign investment. These agreements, primarily focused on reducing or eliminating tariffs, provide preferential access to large markets and stimulate exports, but also pose challenges to domestic businesses. The agreements prioritize the flow of goods and services while outlining tax benefits for exporters and seeking to establish a more sustainable economic development path.
